text: Hey Adam, I can't recommend an exact way to solve for the 1 per minute, but to help slow things down I branch off the first letter of their name.  It's not the best by any means, but the best I've been able to do so far
Can you provide more detail? have you found your answer?

Adam, there are likely a few ways you can handle that issue. Chris is right, you'll want to create a branch - HubSpot recently added an A/B option as part of workflows and you could do that there. How we've handled that required slowdown is by pushing all of the contacts into a google doc then using a webhook to slow everything down
Do you have access to custom code?
Hi, any reason why there isn’t an association between the ticket and contact?
yes <@U05CJMDM467>. I just tagged you in the thread that had the solution!
